title: Blackhat.2015.HDRip.XVID.AC3-5.1.HQ.Hive-CM8
description:
<a href="http://img909.imageshack.us/img909/5305/ryzk5K.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://img909.imageshack.us/img909/5305/ryzk5K.jpg</a>

Blackhat.2015.HDRip.XVID.AC3-5.1.HQ.Hive-CM8

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time

Sources: 

Video: Russian 1080p Web-dl
Audio: MrSeen-Simple-Jiinx Line Audio
          and the Russian 5.1 Track
thx

Notes:

that was a load of work, took me 3 days, its finally done, am happy with the result

Encode:

Video was already nice, did the usual added bit brightness and sharpness

For the Audio i took sweet line from jiinx, removed noise and hiss, and raised the vocals till it sounded perfect and clear
Took me 2hrs to resync the audio to my video, as usual all is lipsync
Cleaned the Russian Audiotrack from voice and entered the line into the 5.1 track
Audio sounds now retailish with all the music and soundeffects inside.

What took most of the time were the subs that are so needed in this movie for that foreign parts.
Found a guy who speaks chinese to translate me the text, and than i had to retime each sub which wasnt funny at all
when i thought it was done i noticed there are still some other foreign subs needed which i also translated
along with onscreen text subs, what a pita to do.
i do think i got them all now, its not gonna get better than this.

hope you appreciate the hours of work
this will do me till retail in may
enjoy

Video: 720x304 @bitrate 1500 2pass
Audio: English AC3 5.1 @384
Sample: yes included
Subs: yes hardcoded for all foreign parts only


PS:
have a perfect Fast and Furious 7 HD-Video, what i need is a line for it
who wants to help me out doing the perfect release?
You have a line? you can get a line? you know someone who has a line?
you wanna help, here is your chance to contribute!
contact me via mail thx
